page.title: 11Tourism
page.content: There are plenty of bed & breakfast places to stay.The beaches are clean and tidy.The rocks are slippery and great for exploring sea creatures.Most things at the nearby model village which can be seen from the downs, appeal to young children,old people or the whole family.The fields are ideal for playing tennis and football.The trails are also ideal for learning about insects,plants and trees.The birds will sing and the breathtaking views will certainly take yours away. This makes it an ideal place to stay. Tourists mostly stay in hotels, chalets,bed & breakfast places and rented cottages.There are a few facilities to holiday makers at Maidencombe which include the tea rooms,country parks,beaches and licensed bar,cafe.There are no especially interesting places in
